DataSource.Name: Default
DataSource.SQL: select§§n convert(varchar, T.TransactionFiscalDate, 103) as DateRedeemed,§§n SubString(convert(varchar, T.TransactionDateTime, 8), 1, 5) as TimeRedeemed,§§n T.TransactionId,§§n ('T:' + CONVERT(varchar(10), T.LicenseId) + '.' + CONVERT(varchar(5), W.StationSerial) + '.' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(6),T.TransactionFiscalDate, 12) + '.' + CONVERT(varchar(5), T.TransactionSerial)) as [TDSSN],§§n S.SaleCode,§§n AD.CompanyName as Organization,§§n V.VoucherName as VoucherName,§§n V.VoucherCode as VoucherCode,§§n V.VoucherDescription as VoucherDescription,§§n V.CreateDate as DateIssued,§§n Stuff((§§n select ', ' + CAT.CategoryName§§n from§§n tbCategory2Entity C2E inner join§§n tbCategory CAT on CAT.CategoryId=C2E.CategoryId§§n where C2E.EntityId=A.AccountId§§n order by CAT.CategoryName§§n FOR XML PATH('')§§n ), 1, 2, '') as CategoryNames,§§n P.ProductName as ProductName,§§n SIV.Quantity as Quantity,§§n VI.UnitPrice as Price,§§n (VI.UnitPrice * SIV.Quantity) as TotalValue§§nfrom§§n tbTransaction T inner join§§n tbSale S on S.SaleId = T.SaleId inner join§§n tbWorkstation W on W.WorkstationId=T.WorkstationId inner join§§n tbTransactionItem TI on TI.TransactionId=T.TransactionId inner join§§n tbSaleItemVoucher SIV on SIV.SaleItemId=TI.SaleItemId inner join§§n tbVoucherItem VI on VI.VoucherId=SIV.VoucherId inner join§§n tbSaleItem SI on SI.SaleItemId=SIV.SaleItemId and SI.ProductId=VI.ProductId inner join§§n tbVoucher V on V.VoucherId=VI.VoucherId left join§§n tbProduct P on P.ProductId=VI.ProductId inner join§§n tbAccount A on A.AccountId=V.AccountId left join§§n tbAccountDetail AD on AD.AccountId=A.AccountId§§nwhere §§n T.TransactionType=44 and §§n T.TransactionFiscalDate>=:@DateFrom and§§n T.TransactionFiscalDate<=:@DateTo§§norder by§§n T.TransactionDateTime,§§n AD.CompanyName,§§n V.VoucherName,§§n V.VoucherDescription,§§n V.VoucherCode,§§n P.ProductName
